Version Manager Processing Events

Event Name Definition
AllEvents All Version Manager events in this table.
Check In/Before Just before checking in a workfile. This event occurs if there is nothing to prevent Version Manager from checking in the file.
Check In/After After a successful check in of a workfile.
Check In/Unconditional Before checking in a workfile. The workfile has not been read by Version Manager yet.
Check Out/Before Just before checking out a revision.
Check Out/After After a successful check out of a revision.
Promote/Before Just before promoting a revision.
Promote/After After a successful promotion of a revision.
Version Label/Before Just before applying a version label.
Version Label/After After applying a version label. This event does not occur after deleting a version label
Journal/After When an entry is made to the journal file.
Lock/Before Just before locking a revision. This event occurs whether or not a revision is checked out at the same time.
Lock/After After locking a revision. This occurs whether or not a revisions is checked out at the time of the lock.
Unlock/Before Just before unlocking a revision. This event also occurs when checking in an unchanged workfile if the Remove Lock on Unchanged Revision configuration option is set.
Unlock/After After unlocking a revision. This event also occurs when checking in an unchanged workfile if the Remove Lock on Unchanged Revision configuration option is set.
Create Archive/Before Just before creating a new archive. This event also occurs before checking in an initial revision if the OK to Create New Archive on Check In configuration option is set.
Create Archive/After After creating a new archive. This event also occurs when checking in an initial revision if the OK to Create New Archive on Check In configuration option is set.

See Also
